12.title: Mahadev
12.description: He is the supreme being and the destroyer of evil. Witness lord Shiva's story, his avatars, and a union that shaped the universe - his marriage to Parvati.

363.title: Savdhaan India
363.description: From a dangerous murder plot to a thoroughly planned robbery, unmask the gory face of terror through a dramatised version of the crimes happening around you!

1654.title: SuperCops
1654.description: ACP Diler and his team of supercops fight deadly villains, mutants and monsters for the safety of the common man.

3250.title: Kalash...Ek Vishwaas
3250.description: Kalash Ek Vishwaas is a family drama. Ambitious Devika wants to study and stand on her own feet, while her traditional grandmother has other ideas!

3613.title: Piya Rangrezz
3613.description: Sher Singh, a powerful man for the society only worships his mother, Bhanwari Devi. However, his priorities change when the soft-spoken Shraddha enters his life.

7326.title: Bahu Humari Rajni_Kant
7326.description: Shaan, a scientist creates a robot, Rajni, as a one-stop-solution for humans. When he ends up marrying her, his life becomes a hilarious circus.

7662.title: May I Come in Madam
7662.description: Tired of his intrusive in-laws and lack of privacy with his wife, Kashmira, Sajan finds an escape in his authoritative yet attractive new boss, but has he?

9278.title: Nagarjun Ek Yoddha
9278.description: A puzzling mystery surrounds Arjun, a 20-year-old boy, who in order to save his loved ones must unearth some deep secrets related to his past.

13307.title: Chandrakanta
13307.description: The twisted love tale of Prince Virendra and Princess Chandrakanta, who are reborn to fight the evil forces of Maricha.

15017.title: Kya Haal Mr. Paanchal
15017.description: Kunti's innocent wish of a perfect bride for her son Kanhaiya, lands her up with five daughters-in-laws, each with a unique quality, leading to a comical ride.

15520.title: Kaal Bhairav Rahasya
15520.description: Heirs of Kanakgarh's Royal family don't survive beyond the age of 30. Will Veer and his lady love Archana free the family from the 150-year-old curse?

1260000646.title: RadhaKrishn
1260000646.description: Radha and Krishna are the epitome of eternal love and sacrifice, transcending eras and emotions. Here's a never-seen-before retelling of this supreme romance.

1260011373.title: Maa Vaishnodevi
1260011373.description: A riveting story of Goddess Vaishno Devi, an amalgamation of supreme powers to fight every battle against evil and save the mankind.

1260066571.title: Tera Mera Saath Rahe
1260066571.description: Talented but timid Gopika fails to match up to her husband's expectations. When she finds a mentor in her mother-in-law, Meethila, things take a turn.

1260087189.title: Woh Toh Hai Albelaa
1260087189.description: Where there is love, there’s a clash! Krishna and Sayuri have had a picture-perfect marriage. But with an obsessive Chaman keeping tabs, will true love prevail?

1260106586.title: Channa Mereya
1260106586.description: Aditya, an NRI aspires to be a sought-after hotelier but is weighed down by his family. Things take an interesting turn when he meets Ginni, a countryside chef.

1260108189.title: Na Umra Ki Seema Ho
1260108189.description: Vidhi, a young woman, falls in love with Devratha, a middle-aged tycoon. Together they embark on a journey of love and acceptance beyond the barrier of age.

1260108191.title: Ajooni
1260108191.description: Surpassing personal conflicts, Ajooni and Rajveer embrace love. But with conspiracies brewing within the family, their relationship must stand the test of time.

1260125771.title: Dheere Dheere Se
1260125771.description: Tragedy follows a grieving widow Bhawana as she navigates through the hardships of life. In pursuit of a better future, she must brave against the odds.

1260128800.title: Meri Saas Bhoot Hai
1260128800.description: Gaura’s world goes into a tailspin after her deceased mother-in-law haunts her. With a spooky-yet-sassy Saas keeping tabs, will she be able to change her fate?
